alert.note: Alert for Cowley; Sumner (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 28 at 12:02AM CDT until June 28 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CDT FOR COWLEY AND EASTERN SUMNER COUNTIES... At 1202 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles north of Atlanta to 5 miles east of Burden to near Hardy, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Arkansas City, Winfield, Mulvane, Belle Plaine, Oxford, Udall, Burden, Dexter, Atlanta, Geuda Springs, Rock, Cambridge, Maple City, Winfield City Lake and Strother Field Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
